rooms.name: AllenHallFrontDesk
rooms.description: You are in Allen Hall, in front of the Front Desk.

rooms.name: GregoryDrive
rooms.description: You are at 1005 West Gregory Drive, outside Allen Hall

rooms.name: IlliniGrove
rooms.description: You are at Illini Grove. There is nothing to do here.

rooms.name: TennisCourt
rooms.description: You are at the University of Illinois Tennis Courts. There are people playing tennis here.

rooms.name: ATO
rooms.description: You are outside Alpha Tau Omega. You can see people partying here.

rooms.name: PlantSciencesLaboratory
rooms.description: You are outside the Plant Sciences Laboratory. There are a lot of plants.

rooms.name: PlayingFields
rooms.description: You are at the Dorner Drive Playing Fields. There is a pond here. You can go for a swim, but the water is frozen.

rooms.name: PlantSciencesBasement
rooms.description: You are in the basement of the Plant Sciences Laboratory. There are more plants here.
